text: The Raut Ministry is the Council of Ministers headed by Mohammad Lalbabu Raut that was formed after the 2017 provincial election which was held in two phases starting from 26 November to end in 7 December 2017. This is a list of minister from chief minister Mohammad Lalbabu Raut cabinet starting from February 15, 2018. Mohammad Lalbabu Raut is the leader of FSFN who was sworn in the Chief Ministers of Province No. 2 in February 2018 with the help of RJPN. Raut's cabinet ministry is consist of 7 ministers. ==Chief Minister & Cabinet Ministers== {| class ="wikitable" |- ! S.No. ! Name ! Department ! Took office !
